answer:
ImmunizeBC only answers questions about immunization. For information about TB screening options, please speak with your health care provider. You can speak with a nurse at HealthlinkBC anytime by calling 8-1-1.
Immunization Nurse
question: I took chickenpox two days ago. I know I won't be able to do a TB skin test until 4 weeks later. I've had a BCG vaccine before. Can I do a blood work for TB next week?
